quote: The world of knowledge takes a crazy turn when teachers themselves are taught to learn.
Children today are tyrants. They contradict their parent, gobble their food, and tyrannize their teachers.
I had a terrible education. I attended a school for emotionally disturbed teachers.
It's okay to make mistakes. Mistakes are our teachers - they help us to learn.
Those who know how to think need no teachers.
Those who know how to think need no teachers.
Very often we developed a better grasp of the subjects than the over worked teachers.
